exercises.name: Bench Press
exercises.exerciseInfo: A compound exercise targeting the chest, shoulders, and triceps using a barbell. It's a fundamental exercise for building upper body strength and muscle mass.
exercises.optimalRange: For Hypertrophy, the optimal range is between 6-12 reps.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Flyes
exercises.exerciseInfo: An isolated exercise targeting the chest with dumbbells in a fly motion. Lie flat on a bench, extend arms with dumbbells above chest, then lower arms out to sides in an arc motion.
exercises.optimalRange: For Hypertrophy, the optimal range is between 8-12 reps.

exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.exerciseInfo: A compound exercise targeting the chest, shoulders, and triceps using body weight. Start in a plank position, lower body by bending elbows, then push back up.
exercises.optimalRange: For Endurance, the optimal range is between 10-20 reps.

exercises.name: Chest Press
exercises.exerciseInfo: A compound exercise targeting the chest, shoulders, and triceps using a machine. Sit on machine, grip handles, push forward until arms are extended, then return to starting position.
exercises.optimalRange: For Hypertrophy, the optimal range is between 8-12 reps.

exercises.name: Incline Bench Press
exercises.exerciseInfo: A compound exercise targeting the upper chest, shoulders, and triceps using a barbell. Lie on incline bench, grip barbell, lower to upper chest, then push back up.
exercises.optimalRange: For Hypertrophy, the optimal range is between 6-12 reps.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Pullover
exercises.exerciseInfo: An isolated exercise targeting the chest and back with dumbbells in a pullover motion. Lie flat on bench, hold dumbbell above chest, lower behind head, then return to start position.
exercises.optimalRange: For Hypertrophy, the optimal range is between 8-12 reps.

exercises.name: Shoulder Press
exercises.exerciseInfo: A compound exercise targeting the shoulders, trapezius, and triceps using a barbell. Sit on bench, grip barbell, press overhead until arms are extended, then lower back down.
exercises.optimalRange: For Hypertrophy, the optimal range is between 6-12 reps.

exercises.name: Lateral Raises
exercises.exerciseInfo: An isolated exercise targeting the side delts with dumbbells in a lateral raise motion. Stand with dumbbells at sides, raise arms out to sides until parallel to floor, then lower back down.
exercises.optimalRange: For Hypertrophy, the optimal range is between 10-15 reps.

exercises.name: Front Raises
exercises.exerciseInfo: An isolated exercise targeting the front delts with dumbbells in a front raise motion. Stand with dumbbells in front of thighs, raise arms in front of body until parallel to floor, then lower back down.
exercises.optimalRange: For Hypertrophy, the optimal range is between 10-15 reps.

exercises.name: Bicep Curls
exercises.exerciseInfo: An isolated exercise targeting the biceps with dumbbells in a curl motion. Stand with dumbbells at sides, curl weights upwards towards shoulders, then lower back down.
exercises.optimalRange: For Hypertrophy, the optimal range is between 8-12 reps.

exercises.name: Hammer Curls
exercises.exerciseInfo: An isolated exercise targeting the biceps with dumbbells in a hammer curl motion. Stand with dumbbells at sides, curl weights upwards with neutral grip, then lower back down.
exercises.optimalRange: For Hypertrophy, the optimal range is between 8-12 reps.

exercises.name: Tricep Dips
exercises.exerciseInfo: A compound exercise targeting the triceps using body weight and a dip motion. Position hands on parallel bars, lower body until elbows are at 90 degrees, then push back up.
exercises.optimalRange: For Endurance, the optimal range is between 10-20 reps.

exercises.name: Tricep Pushdowns
exercises.exerciseInfo: An isolated exercise targeting the triceps using a cable machine in a pushdown motion. Stand in front of cable machine, grasp bar, push bar downwards until arms are extended, then return to start position.
exercises.optimalRange: For Hypertrophy, the optimal range is between 8-12 reps.

exercises.name: Pull-ups
exercises.exerciseInfo: A compound exercise targeting the back, biceps, and shoulders using body weight and a pull-up motion. Grip bar with hands slightly wider than shoulder-width, pullup until chin passes the bar, then lower back down with control.
exercises.optimalRange: For Strength, the optimal range is between 4-6 reps.

exercises.name: Barbell Rows
exercises.exerciseInfo: A compound exercise targeting the back, biceps, and shoulders using a barbell in a rowing motion. Bend knees slightly, hinge at hips, grasp bar with palms facing down, pull bar towards lower chest, then lower back down with control.
exercises.optimalRange: For Hypertrophy, the optimal range is between 6-12 reps.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Rows
exercises.exerciseInfo: A compound exercise targeting the back, biceps, and shoulders using dumbbells in a rowing motion. Stand with knees slightly bent, hinge at hips, grasp dumbbells, pull elbows up and back, then lower back down with control.
exercises.optimalRange: For Hypertrophy, the optimal range is between 8-12 reps.

exercises.name: Lat Pulldowns
exercises.exerciseInfo: A compound exercise targeting the back, biceps, and shoulders using a cable machine in a pulldown motion. Sit at machine, grasp bar with wide overhand grip, pull bar down to chest, then return to start position with control.
exercises.optimalRange: For Hypertrophy, the optimal range is between 8-12 reps.

exercises.name: Deadlifts
exercises.exerciseInfo: A compound exercise targeting the back, glutes, hamstrings, and lower back using a barbell. Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, grip barbell with hands just outside legs, push hips back, lower bar to mid-shin, then drive hips forward to stand up straight.
exercises.optimalRange: For Strength and Hypertrophy, the optimal range is between 4-8 reps.

exercises.name: Good Mornings
exercises.exerciseInfo: A compound exercise targeting the lower back, glutes, and hamstrings using a barbell. Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, barbell across back, hinge at hips, lower torso forward until parallel to floor, then return to start position with control.
exercises.optimalRange: For Strength and Hypertrophy, the optimal range is between 6-10 reps.

exercises.name: Russian Twists
exercises.exerciseInfo: An isolated exercise targeting the abs and obliques using a twisting motion. Sit on floor with knees bent, lean back slightly, hold arms in front of chest, rotate torso to left, then to right, keeping core engaged.
exercises.optimalRange: For Endurance, the optimal range is between 12-20 reps.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.exerciseInfo: A compound exercise targeting the abs and obliques using a static hold position. Start in push-up position, lower onto forearms, keep body straight from head to heels, hold position for specified time.
exercises.optimalRange: For Endurance, the optimal range is between 30 seconds to 2 minutes.

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.exerciseInfo: A compound exercise targeting the quads, hamstrings, and glutes using a barbell. Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, barbell across back, lower hips back and down until thighs are parallel to floor, then drive through heels to stand up straight.
exercises.optimalRange: For Strength and Hypertrophy, the optimal range is between 6-12 reps.

exercises.name: Lunges
exercises.exerciseInfo: A compound exercise targeting the quads, hamstrings, and glutes using dumbbells in a lunge motion. Stand tall with dumbbells at sides, step forward with one leg, lower hips until both knees are bent at 90 degrees, then push back up to starting position.
exercises.optimalRange: For Hypertrophy, the optimal range is between 8-12 reps.

exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.exerciseInfo: A compound exercise targeting the quads, hamstrings, and glutes using a leg press machine. Sit on machine with back against pad, place feet shoulder-width apart on platform, extend legs until nearly fully straight, then lower platform back down with control.
exercises.optimalRange: For Hypertrophy, the optimal range is between 8-12 reps.

exercises.name: Leg Extensions
exercises.exerciseInfo: An isolated exercise targeting the quads using a leg extension machine. Sit on machine with knees bent, place shins under padded lever, extend legs until knees are almost straight, then return to start position with control.
exercises.optimalRange: For Hypertrophy, the optimal range is between 8-12 reps.

exercises.name: Hamstring Curls
exercises.exerciseInfo: An isolated exercise targeting the hamstrings using a hamstring curl machine. Lie face down on machine, position legs under padded lever, curl legs up towards buttocks, then lower back down with control.
exercises.optimalRange: For Hypertrophy, the optimal range is between 8-12 reps.
